page.title: 19WOKINGHAM - CLUBS
page.content: Wokingham can offer something for all interests and tastes. For mums and toddlers there are a variety of activities in the form of playgroups and day nurseries. In line with the{National trend} residents have been joining the { {fitness boom}so that everywhere you look somebody is either swimming, jogging, working-out or generally involved in some form of exercise. There are clubs for slimming and fitness for all shapes and sizes. St. Crispins Centre offers a particularly wide range of activities from organised tuition to casual come along and join in events. {Local schools}are used for{adult {education}classes, these being organised from Montague House, Broad Street. For men and women there is an unlimited choice of things to do.
